post.body: it sure is!
hoe is je nieuwe baan?
and the girl has the nicest monitor... ;) (from the back)
Nerdism?
have fun!
stop SPAM @twinkle
great Python is easy. C U tomorrow!
great avatar! I'm going to create an justice avatar too!
ohwke, fine. AppEngine is fast!
sounds like a great idea. Do you want to build the chat-app on Ruby too?
I'm jealous! I'm saving for the same one :D
what stats app are you using in your precious post?
So happy I bought some apple pie for myself. Thanks @geodriehoek :D
Ok. I seriously need some rest. Been working for 10+ hours now. New day tomorrow, g'night.
can't see movieclips, actionscript and other flash stuff for a loooooonnggg time!
I love illustrator to make illustrations. The thought that I can scale it as much as I want, gives me a powerfull feeling.
Testing Eventbox, I think it's to much an app for twittering...
Playing with hair (for school) feels kinda weird. Though it's fun.
Why is there some spambot who wants to contact me all the time on msn? Kinda weird...
Lying in bed, working.
Finally something just worked @flash.
I hate I hate I hate!
Playing useless games
Working for a client, tomorrow is definately a work-on-school-day!
jeez, need to compile ror on my server, then subversion-bindings and then, maybee warehouse will work...
Installing wharehouse .
Just updated my avatar, minor changes, though.
Wants Justice on #1 at Last.fm just 600 listens to go..
I Things.
Trying to be a flash-nerd while being a flash-n00b.
New day! Hi everyone.
And for you guys a great (ahum) pic. of Justice. http://snipurl.com/8xmnz
Radio Soulwaxmas was unforgettable! Unbelievable that I actually talked to one of the de Waeles (Soulwax)!!!
Sometimes I think the 'i' in my name is an 'l' bad anti-aliasing...
A girlfriend is mad at me for calling disabled people Darwin-unworthy.
Weaponed with Red bull, Coca Cola and Chips.
What is this bad New York show I'm watching? I think it's called 'Related'?
Creating a storyboard: I like it.
Getting up early makes me feel sick. Winterbreak is officially over. 
I hate it when it's to cold for wearing a t-shirt, but to warm for waring a t-shirt and a sweater at home. Yuck!
I <3 Fontcase
Finaly got time to test Fontcase. Lovely app!
Wow! Empty downloadsfolder in months!
Watching a very old show by a Dutch comedian. ROFL
Goodmorning! Just 2 days left for doing stuff for myself. Bummer.

Just made my own handwriting font. Going to make anotherone for a project.
MacBook gives kernel-panic now? Great.
